name: StickFactory
description:
Thank you for checking out the page! If you interested in the Game you can preorder or Donate.

STORY:

Your a little Stickman at home from a long day of work at the Police station  you turn on the news and hear the normal cast until an emergency broadcast says that say criminals are on the loose... The tv stops working and it a blink of an eye 3 people are holding guns at your head. You do not know what to do... You tell them where the office is and right before They go You steal there gun and start firing than all you hear is shots... You crawl out there to see more cars coming in you hop on one of the windows and the car starts moving you punch the dude driving trying to stop the car but he wont. There squad starts coming in with a helicopter, You knew that there were going to try to snipe you until the police get a call they rush in just in time and shoot down the helicopter the car crashes into a gate and heads straight to a building the helicopter was coming down at there direction you look and say "Its a factory" Than... Preorder the Game to Find out!
